notes: It is not possible to summon him from his coffin without the associated quest.
name: The Count
location: [[Green Claw Swamp]], beneath the [[Blood Herb Quest]] area.
strategy:
Kill him as fast as possible, since he does really high combos (up to 700) when a banshee is summoned. He probably isn't a creature to be hunted. He's strong, dangerous and doesn't drop any valuable item other than a [[Vampire Shield]].
{{JSpoiler|If you release him and don't kill him, you can not release him again, so you will have to buy [[The Ring of the Count]] from a player or from [[Black Bert]] to continue [[The Inquisition Quest]]. If you put 3 [[garlic necklace]]s on the counters around the buried coffin, you can save yourself a lot of trouble. After that, you use the upper part of the coffin and [[The Weakened Count]] appears (looks the same as regular vampire and causes the same damage). '''This strategy is highly recommended to use!'''}}
